thread.title: Sam Smith, Rita Ora, John Mayer and Lenny Kravitz rumoured to headline New Year’s Day at Sydney’s Watsons Bay Hotel
thread.title_full: Sam Smith, Rita Ora, John Mayer and Lenny Kravitz rumoured to headline New Year’s Day at Sydney’s Watsons Bay Hotel | DailyTelegraph

author: dailytelegraph.com
title: Sam Smith, Rita Ora, John Mayer and Lenny Kravitz rumoured to headline New Year’s Day at Sydney’s Watsons Bay Hotel
text:
THE Watson’s Bay Boutique Hotel is collaborating with legendary New York venue The Surf Lodge to put on what’s shaping up to be the hottest New Year’s Day event on Sydney’s social calendar.
The Surf Lodge founder Jayma Cardoso is in the midst of taking her brand global and now brings her venue down under with a month of live music events and lifestyle experiences staged on the sandy shoreline of Watsons Bay — just in time for New Year’s Day.
Lenny Kravitz. John Mayer. The Surf Lodge x Watsons Bay Boutique Hotel kicks off with a decadent New Year’s Day beach party for invited guests, with a secret headlining performance rumoured to be either John Mayer, Sam Smith, Lenny Kravitz or Rita Ora.
The event will no doubt be the most talked about 1 January party in Sydney with the select VIP’s invited given a code to buy up to 10 tickets for their clique.
Up to 200 tickets are available for the general public on the venue’s website.
Sam Smith is also named as the rumoured headliner. Picture: Getty
